remarks: Range of the recursive sequence builder (special case of ~ seqf2 ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2013.)
statement:
seqf.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
seqf.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
seqf.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. Z ) -> ( F ` x ) e. S ) $.
seqf.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. S ) $.
seqf $p |- ( ph -> seq M ( .+ , F ) : Z --> S ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d Z x $.
$d ph x y $.
